document_data.name: ''Gorgon Plate''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''gorgon plate''''' was a suit of [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[full plate|full plate mail]] crafted by the [[drow]] of the [[Underdark]] under [[Old Shanatar]]. It was different from most [[armor]] crafted by the dark elves, in that it could withstand being exposed to light when it was brought upon the surface world of [[Toril]].
document_data.Powers: This ''+4 set of full plate armor'' offered its wearer extra protection against acid and fire, both mundane or [[magic]]al in nature.
document_data.Creation: This armor earned its name from a unique ingredient used in its crafting, the blood of a [[gorgon]].
document_data.Notable wearers: [[Matron mother]] [[Ardulace Despana]] of [[Ust Natha]] was known to wear a suit of ''gorgon plate'' armor.
